oval.message: You have balanced features with gentle curves. These designs will enhance your natural symmetry.  Rihanna and Julia Roberts have similar facial aura.

round.message: You have softer angles with similar width and height — here are lengthening styles that will bring gentle focus to your features. Your aura mirrors Selena Gomez and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan.

square.message: You have strong jawline and broad forehead — these curves and drop styles will soften your features. Your aura mirrors Jennifer Aniston and Demi Moore.

heart.message: You have longer than wide face with a straighter jaw - these wider and layered styles will add softness to your energy. Naomi Campbell and Deepika Padukone have similar aura.

diamond.message: Your face has cheekbones as the widest point — these styles will add width at the jaw. Your aura mirrors Jennifer Lopez and Scarlett Johansson.

rectangle.message: You have wider forehead with a tapered jaw — these styles will add volume near your jawline and enhance your sophistication. Your aura mirrors Katrina Kaif and Meryl Streep.
